EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202304-HHS-ENT-HIMSS-2023.00a Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Invest in a more secure future with the virtual care leader
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HIMSS23 - April 17-21 Increase your capacity for care VISIT US AT BOOTH 225 Of all the innovations you’ll see at HIMSS23, make it a priority to hear how we’re in our 20th year of helping our clients use virtual care to address today’s healthcare challenges while planning for the future.
- Stop by Booth #225 <[[https://airtable.com/shr9JnW31Fob0DK9C]]> to see demos of our virtual nursing, telestroke and other first-of-kind solutions - Learn how our partnership with Microsoft Teams makes it even easier for care teams to collaborate - Hear how our clients and partners are using virtual care to increase their capacity for care About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
